summary: Fixed compose buffer which-key mappings by switching from cond-based registration to buffer-local keymaps. Added <leader>me (send), <leader>md (draft), <leader>mq (discard) to setup_compose_keymaps() function. Removed redundant is_compose_buffer helper and conditional wk.add() block from which-key.lua.

artifacts.summary: Added buffer-local leader keymaps for compose actions

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed compose buffer which-key mappings not appearing by switching from cond-based registration (which only controls activation) to buffer-local keymaps using vim.keymap.set with buffer option. Added <leader>me, <leader>md, <leader>mq to setup_compose_keymaps() and removed redundant which-key registrations.

next_steps: Test changes by opening a compose buffer (HimalayaWrite or reply) and pressing <leader>m to verify e/d/q options appear in which-key popup
